roleset.name: to turn or rotate

example.name: transitive
example.text: Mainstream economists and commentators , craning their necks up at the great pyramids of junk financing , swiveling their heads to watch the avalanche of leveraged buy - outs , claimed the end result would be a leaner , meaner corporate America , with soaring productivity and profits and the weaker gone to the wall .

propbank.arg: to watch the avalanche of leveraged buy - outs

roleset.note: SWIVEL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'swivel' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from swivel.01-v predicate notes)
